subject: Doping (Sports)
Track and Field
Deaths (Obituaries)
Olympic Games
Human Growth Hormone
lead_paragraph: Pettigrew, who gave up his 2000 Olympic sprint-relay gold medal after admitting to doping, was found dead in his car.
snippet: Pettigrew, who gave up his 2000 Olympic sprint-relay gold medal after admitting to doping, was found dead in his car.
